title: I'm so sick of this packet loss....

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i can't play this anymore until this gets fixed every single fucking game i get packet loss and im so sick of having queues for dcing so much. the only way i can fix it is to restart my league every time. PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

ok sorry i didnt get back to you earlier. i got the results below.

http://n2.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=36a470be-32378-1e1c2e27-b0a4-4a1e-b6cd

http://pastebin.com/gwhjMYCs

Hey there,

I see a few things that could be causing your issue and a few things that while may not be causing your current problem are things that should be resolved.

Let's start with the things that may be causing your problem;

* You appear to have a very high rate of packet buffering on your connection, please read [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7) about packet buffering which includes tips on what applications may increase the packet buffering rate.
* I notice a fairly significant amount of packet loss along the route to the gameservers, this may be due to the above. If you continue to experience these issues I would recommend speaking with your ISP.

Now onto the other issues;

* Your ISP's DNS server appears to be misconfigured, or may be slow to respond. I recommend you to [switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).
* Your systems clock appears to be wayyy out of sync, please [sync your system clock](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq3).
